Pacote Base do R)

```{r}
system.time({
  df_base <- read.csv("Dados/flights.csv")
})
```

Pacote readr)

```{r}
library(readr)

system.time({
  df_readr <- read_csv("Dados/flights.csv")
})
```

Do Pandas em Python)

```{r}
library(reticulate)
py_config()
```

```{python}

import pandas as pd
import time

start = time.time()
df_pandas = pd.read_csv("Dados/flights.csv")
end = time.time()

print("Tempo pandas:", end - start, "segundos")
```
